author: __flcl
content:
Send-blobs tool small update: you can now send broken txs. Cases covered are listed here:
https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/tree/feature/send-blobs-tool/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.SendBlobs#usage
I did not test 1000 blobs, the connection goes down, works most likely <:crazycry:932693133546889216>. The image has been updated too
(devnet-v7 version)
